channel.title: Boxing fracture, i think?
channel.description:
Ok, well i got mad at some idiot in publix, so i went out of the store, and took it out on my trucks windshield, and punched it as hard as i could.
Now, it's been a week. i haven't been to a doctor, and i can only move my pinky vertically, horizontally, it is slack. And i have giant knot behind where my knuckle was(still is, i think it may not be visible due to the swelling).
Can anyone tell me if i need to go to a doctor, or if it's fine the way it is, if i just wrap it.

item.title: Boxing fracture, i think?
item.dc:creator: @I_x3Pserver I_x3Pserver
item.description:
@I_x3Pserver wrote:

i just got back from surgery, you’ll need close reduction pinning.

Read full topic

item.title: Boxing fracture, i think?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“killakj, post:17, topic:195490”][quote author=I_x3Pserver link=topic=259960.msg2157826#msg2157826 date=1207263099]

What the fuck! How wierd… i have excactly the same thing! At first it was all swollen and now theres a big hard, bone like lump. I’m just gonna let it go… it hurts a bit though.

Hahahaha you don’t have NHS you have to pay… that’s hilarious.

I’m going to the hospital on Sunday so… wahey?

Go to a doctor, i went today, and the 5th metacarple(however you spell it) has a break in it if you have that lump.
I will need to get surgery to straiten the angulation of the bone.
[/quote]
that sucks, but will it be really expensive cause the pinky’s are small not like breaking legs or arms[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Boxing fracture, i think?
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

Silver Lining:

What the fuck? Seems everyone likes punching shit. Seriously, punch softer things. Babies will work.

No you tell me! I hit some kid in the head, he backed off so quick, then my hand hurt, I broke my 5th metacarpal. It didn’t hurt it just throbbed because I hit him.

Read full topic

Go to a doctor, i went today, and the 5th metacarple(however you spell it) has a break in it if you have that lump.
I will need to get surgery to straiten the angulation of the bone.

item.title: Boxing fracture, i think?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

This kind of happened to me on the weekend, I fucked up in the last race and punched the handlebar, my knuckles are all bruised and my middle finger knuckle is really black and hurts like fuck if a fly lands on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Boxing fracture, i think?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

davidude36:

Gotta be kidding me, here in my town with free health care its absolutely shit, the doctor treats you like an inanimate object and the waiting rooms are filled other ill people whom probably have aids or something. Not to mention the desk worker people… they sit there and couldn’t give a shit about anything. Try ringing them up and they will try to be as unhelpful as they can.

Yea, but you can’t get AIDS from somebody in a wating room

Read full topic

item.title: Boxing fracture, i think?
item.dc:creator: @tr3v0r TR3V0R
item.description:
@tr3v0r wrote:

I’ve had this about 4 weeks ago and yes you should see a doctor if you care how your hand will look. You didn’t actually break your pinky its most likely your hand growth plate. At least thats what it was for me when i got into a fight with my friend and punched his hard head lol. I had the swelling on the knuckle and thought it was my pinky at first too. I’m pretty sure its your growth plate.

Read full topic

item.title: Boxing fracture, i think?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Lol im just leaving mine… it hurts but I don’t want MRSA lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Boxing fracture, i think?
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

Strap it up to your other finger, to keep it straight if push comes to shove when you have to put the finger painfully in place then go to the doctor. Remember strap it up!

Read full topic

item.title: Boxing fracture, i think?
item.dc:creator: @I_x3Pserver I_x3Pserver
item.description:
@I_x3Pserver wrote:

Well, theres gotta be something wrong, my pinky will not straiten unless i move it with my other hand, but then again. that could just be the swelling.

Except, i’m a pianist, i don’t want this ruining my hobby.

Read full topic

item.title: Boxing fracture, i think?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:5, topic:195490”][quote] theres really no excuse to not see the doctor. Just remember this is a [supposedly] runescape cheating forum. We are not medical professionals.
[/quote]

Gotta be kidding me, here in my town with free health care its absolutely shit, the doctor treats you like an inanimate object and the waiting rooms are filled other ill people whom probably have aids or something. Not to mention the desk worker people… they sit there and couldn’t give a shit about anything. Try ringing them up and they will try to be as unhelpful as they can.

Although thats just a view by me. And i do advise exactly the same as jme(Go see a doctor if its free).[/quote]

Lol the only thing I have to complain is the ~40 minute waiting time. Well, or the 6 months waiting time for my knee lol.

I just meant, it’s better then paying a fortune just for the doctor to say “its broken but we cant do anything for it” or something like that.

Read full topic

Not to mention the desk worker people… they sit there and couldn’t give a shit about anything. Try ringing them up and they will try to be as unhelpful as they can.

Although thats just a view by me. And i do advise exactly the same as jme(Go see a doctor if its free).[/quote]

Wow that sucks,well its not like that here where I live atleast…

I also advise seeing a doctor,it could always cause you alot of pain in the future and you will regret being a dumbass and not seeing a doctor.

Read full topic

item.title: Boxing fracture, i think?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

theres really no excuse to not see the doctor. Just remember this is a [supposedly] runescape cheating forum. We are not medical professionals.

Gotta be kidding me, here in my town with free health care its absolutely shit, the doctor treats you like an inanimate object and the waiting rooms are filled other ill people whom probably have aids or something. Not to mention the desk worker people… they sit there and couldn’t give a shit about anything. Try ringing them up and they will try to be as unhelpful as they can.

Although thats just a view by me. And i do advise exactly the same as jme(Go see a doctor if its free).

Read full topic

item.title: Boxing fracture, i think?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Well its not like a doctor can do very much for a pinky finger.

But lets say it heals itself while out of place, you could find it in a lot of pain for the rest of your life.

If you live in a country with free healthcare, theres really no excuse to not see the doctor. Just remember this is a [supposedly] runescape cheating forum. We are not medical professionals.

Read full topic
